verses.verse: And it came to pass<WH2985>, when Jabin king<WH4428> of Hazor<WH2674> heard<WH8085> thereof<WH7971>, that he sent to Jobab<WH3103> king<WH4428> of Madon<WH4068>, and to the king<WH4428> of Shimron<WH8110>, and to the king<WH4428> of Achshaph<WH407>,

and to the kings<WH4428> that were on the north<WH6828>, in the hill-country<WH2022>, and in the Arabah<WH6160> south<WH5045> of Chinneroth<WH3672>, and in the lowland<WH8219>, and in the heights<WH5299> of Dor<WH1756> on the west<WH3220>,

to the Canaanite<WH3669> on the east<WH4217> and on the west<WH3220>, and the Amorite<WH567>, and the Hittite<WH2850>, and the Perizzite<WH6522>, and the Jebusite<WH2983> in the hill-country<WH2022>, and the Hivite<WH2340> under Hermon<WH2768> in the land<WH776> of Mizpah<WH4709>.

And they went out<WH3318>, they and all their hosts<WH4264> with them<WH7227>, much people<WH5971>, even as the sand<WH2344> that is upon the<WH3220> sea-shore<WH8193> in multitude<WH7230>, with horses<WH5483> and chariots<WH7393> very<WH3966> many<WH7227>.
And all these kings<WH4428> met together<WH3259>; and they came<WH935> and encamped<WH2583> together<WH3259> at the waters<WH4325> of Merom<WH4792>, to fight<WH3898> with Israel<WH3478>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Joshua<WH3091>, Be not afraid<WH3372> because<WH6440> of them<WH4279>; for to-morrow at this time<WH6256> will I deliver them up<WH5414> all slain<WH2491> before<WH6440> Israel<WH3478>: thou shalt hock<WH6131> their horses<WH5483>, and burn<WH8313> their chariots<WH4818> with fire<WH784>.
So Joshua<WH3091> came<WH935>, and all the people<WH5971> of war<WH4421> with him<WH4325>, against them by the waters of Merom<WH4792> suddenly<WH6597>, and fell upon them<WH5307>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of Israel<WH3478>, and they smote<WH5221> them<WH7291>, and chased them unto great<WH7227> Sidon<WH6721>, and unto Misrephoth-maim<WH4956>, and unto the valley<WH1237> of Mizpeh<WH4708> eastward<WH4217>; and they smote<WH5221> them<WH7604>, until they left them none remaining<WH8300>.
And Joshua<WH3091> did<WH6213> unto them as Jehovah<WH3068> bade<WH559> him<WH6131>: he hocked their horses<WH5483>, and burnt<WH8313> their chariots<WH4818> with fire<WH784>.

And Joshua<WH3091> turned back<WH7725> at that time<WH6256>, and took<WH3920> Hazor<WH2674>, and smote<WH5221> the king<WH4428> thereof with the sword<WH2719>: for Hazor<WH2674> beforetime<WH6440> was the head<WH7218> of all those kingdoms<WH4467>.

And they smote<WH5221> all the souls<WH5315> that were therein with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, utterly destroying<WH2763> them<WH3498>; there was none left that breathed<WH5397>: and he burnt<WH8313> Hazor<WH2674> with fire<WH784>.

And all the cities<WH5892> of those kings<WH4428>, and all the kings<WH4428> of them<WH3091>, did Joshua take<WH3920>, and he smote<WH5221> them with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, and utterly destroyed<WH2763> them<WH4872>; as Moses the servant<WH5650> of Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680>.
But as for the cities<WH5892> that stood<WH5975> on their mounds<WH8510>, Israel<WH3478> burned<WH8313> none of them<WH2108>, save Hazor<WH2674> only<WH3091>; that did Joshua burn<WH8313>.

And all the spoil<WH7998> of these cities<WH5892>, and the cattle<WH929>, the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> took for a prey<WH962> unto themselves<WH120>; but every man they smote<WH5221> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, until they had destroyed<WH8045> them<WH7604>, neither left they any that breathed<WH5397>.

As Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872> his servant<WH5650>, so did Moses<WH4872> command<WH6680> Joshua<WH3091>: and so did<WH6213> Joshua<WH3091>; he left<WH5493> nothing<WH1697> undone<WH5493> of all that Jehovah<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

So Joshua<WH3091> took<WH3947> all that land<WH776>, the hill-country<WH2022>, and all the South<WH5045>, and all the land<WH5045> of Goshen<WH1657>, and the lowland<WH8219>, and the Arabah<WH6160>, and the hill-country<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, and the lowland of the same<WH8219>;

from mount<WH2022> Halak<WH2510>, that goeth up<WH5927> to Seir<WH8165>, even unto Baal-gad<WH1171> in the valley<WH1237> of Lebanon<WH3844> under mount<WH2022> Hermon<WH2768>: and all their kings<WH4428> he took<WH3920>, and smote<WH5221> them<WH4191>, and put them to death.
60 <WH3091> made<WH6213> war<WH4421> a long<WH7227> time<WH3117> with all those kings<WH4428>.

There was not a city<WH5892> that made peace<WH7999> with the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, save the Hivites<WH2340> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Gibeon<WH1391>: they took<WH3947> all in battle<WH4421>.

For it was of Jehovah<WH3068> to harden<WH2388> their hearts<WH3820>, to come against<WH7125> Israel<WH3478> in battle<WH4421>, that he might utterly<WH2763> destroy them<WH8467>, that they might have no favor, but that he might destroy<WH8045> them<WH3068>, as Jehovah commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.

And Joshua<WH3091> came<WH935> at that time<WH6256>, and cut off<WH3772> the Anakim<WH6062> from the hill-country<WH2022>, from Hebron<WH2275>, from Debir<WH1688>, from Anab<WH6024>, and from all the hill-country<WH2022> of Judah<WH3063>, and from all the hill-country<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>: Joshua<WH3091> utterly<WH2763> destroyed them with their cities<WH5892>.
There was none of the Anakim<WH6062> left<WH3498> in the land<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>: only in Gaza<WH5804>, in Gath<WH1661>, and in Ashdod<WH795>, did some remain<WH7604>.

So Joshua<WH3091> took<WH3947> the whole land<WH776>, according to all that Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>; and Joshua<WH3091> gave<WH5414> it for an inheritance<WH5159> unto Israel<WH3478> according to their divisions<WH4256> by their tribes<WH7626>. And the land<WH776> had rest<WH8252> from war<WH4421>.
